snippet: The researches said they chose the name, Litarachna lopezae, because Ms. Lopez’s music kept the team in a good mood.
abstract: The researches said they chose the name, Litarachna lopezae, because Ms. Lopez’s music kept the team in a good mood.

headline.main: Scientists Name a Newly Discovered Water Mite After Jennifer Lopez
headline.print_headline: Water Mite Is Named After Jennifer Lopez
